entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
